Category.Name: Ploughman’s Salad
Category.Description: Pork Pie, Pickled Onions, Pickled relish Stilton and Cheddar cheeses and crusty French bread.

Category.Name: Fish and Chips
Category.Description: A smaller portion of our Dinner version

Category.Name: Traditional English Breakfast
Category.Description: The breakfast of champions. 2 Fried eggs, 1 English pork sausage, 1 Back Bacon, 2 pieces of black pudding, baked beans, and 1 slice of fried bread. Served with Brown Sauce

Category.Name: Irish Breakfast
Category.Description: The Irish version of the English breakfast. 2 Fried eggs, 1 Irish pork sausage, 1 rasher, 1 piece of black pudding, 1 piece of white pudding, baked beans, and Irish soda bread.

Category.Name: Sausage Roll
Category.Description: English sausage meat wrapped in a flakey pastry. Served with Brown Sauce

Category.Name: Scotch Egg
Category.Description: A hard-boiled egg, wrapped in pork sausage meat. Covered in breadcrumbs and deep-fried. Served cold with a side of picked relish.

Category.Name: Prawn Cocktail Flavoured Crisps
Category.Description: The classic exotic crisp flavour.

Category.Name: Cheese and Onion Flavoured Crisps
Category.Description: Mum's favourite.

Category.Name: Spotted Dick
Category.Description: The Classic Desert. Steamed suet pudding with currents covered in custard

Category.Name: Eton Mess
Category.Description: Favourite of the old Boys. A mixture of strawberries, pieces of meringue and cream. Old school tie not included!

Category.Name: Jam Roly-Poly
Category.Description: Strawberry Jam rolled up in a suet pudding. Served with Custard

Category.Name: Chip Butty
Category.Description: A soft white roll, slathered with butter and filled with Chips fresh out of the fryer

Category.Name: Pickled Onions
Category.Description: Golf ball sized onions pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

Category.Name: Pickled Eggs
Category.Description: Large hard-boiled eggs pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

Category.Name: Cracklin
Category.Description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

Category.Name: Glazed Doughnut
Category.Description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar glaze.

Category.Name: Jelly Doughnut
Category.Description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar, and filled with strawberry jelly.

Category.Name: Hamburger
Category.Description: Despite the name, ground beef cooked over a charcoal grill with a side of French Fries.

Category.Name: Cheeseburger
Category.Description: Same as the Hamburger with a side of cheddar cheese added.

Category.Name: Meatloaf and Mashed Potatoes
Category.Description: Meatloaf, Mashed Potatoes, Brown gravy and Broccoli.

Category.Name: Pazooki
Category.Description: A large 6 inch round chocolate chip cookie, served warm with 3 large scoops of vanilla ice cream.

Category.Name: Banana Split
Category.Description: One banana cut lengthwise served with scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry ice cream and topped with Pineapple, chocolate and strawberry syrup.

Category.Name: Pork Rinds
Category.Description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

Category.Name: Bacon Wrapped Hot Dog
Category.Description: Take one hot dog, wrap it in bacon and cook until the bacon is nice and crisp. Then place it in the bun.

Category.Name: Hushpuppies
Category.Description: Cornbread dough deep fired served with a variety of dipping sauces.

Category.Name: Biscuits and Gravy
Category.Description: This is a hearty breakfast favorite. Biscuits served with hot sausage gravy

Category.Name: Grilled Cheese and Ham
Category.Description: Sliced ham, American cheese between two slices of White bread buttered on the outside and then fried.

Category.Name: Jambalaya
Category.Description: Creole style Jambalaya, with chicken, andouille sausage, tomatoes, onions, crawfish and rice. Good enough to have you Fais-do-do-ing

Category.Name: The All American Breakfast
Category.Description: Two fried eggs, Sausage (patty or link), crispy bacon, pancakes and maple syrup
